It seems like you are frustrated because you are having trouble obtaining tickets for a particular event. I'm sorry to hear that. Tickets for popular events can sell out quickly, and it can be very disappointing when you are unable to get them. There are a few things you can try to increase your chances of getting tickets:

1. Check the event's website or ticket vendor's website frequently for updates on ticket availability.
2. Set up an alert on a ticket-tracking website or app to be notified when tickets go on sale.
3. Consider buying tickets from a reputable ticket reseller, but be aware that the prices may be higher than the face value of the tickets.
4. If the event has multiple showings or performances, try to get tickets for a less popular time or day.

I hope these tips help! Let me know if you have any other questions.
